This page covers biological details of component Medial Mammillary Nucleus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Diencephalon -> Hypothalamus (HTA.FD.HT) -> Mammillary Body (FD.MB) -> Medial Mammillary Nucleus (HBA.FD.MB.MMB) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: nucleus
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaMMA Forebrain - Memory Management Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Relay for impulses coming from AM and HC
  * *Notes to function*: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events
